mapper.select: select e.id as emp_id, e.user_id, e.master_yn, ed.dept_id, ec.comp_id from employee as e left join employee_department as ed on ed.emp_id=e.id and e.id = #{empId} and org = 1 left join employee_company as ec on ec.emp_id = e.id where ed.transferred_yn = 0 and ed.deleted_yn = 0 and ec.resigned_yn = 0 and ec.deleted_yn = 0 and e.account_yn = 1 and e.deleted_yn = 0;
select master_yn from employee where id=#{empId};
